Name: enforce_team_size_limits
Description: A development team must have a size that is within the allowed range (e.g., 3-9 members).

Name: respect_sprint_capacity
Description: The sum of story points of all user stories in a sprint cannot exceed the team's average velocity.

Name: worker_must_be_active
Description: A worker must have an 'active' status to be assigned to any tasks.

Name: assign_skilled_worker
Description: A worker assigned to a task requiring a specific skill must possess that skill.

Name: respect_project_budget
Description: The total consumed budget for a project cannot exceed the allocated budget.

Name: worker_assigned_to_one_team_only
Description: A single worker can only belong to one team at any given time.

Name: sprint_must_have_a_goal
Description: Every sprint must be associated with exactly one sprint goal.

Name: avoid_high_severity_blockers
Description: A development snapshot cannot be released if it is associated with any unresolved high-severity blockers.

Name: feature_must_be_documented
Description: A feature cannot be considered 'Done' unless it has associated feature documentation.

Name: po_manages_one_backlog
Description: A Product Owner is responsible for exactly one Product Backlog.

Name: task_must_be_in_sprint_backlog
Description: A task being worked on must be part of the current sprint's backlog.
